name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Sales Engineer with 8 years of experience in delivering technical solutions in the fields of **Salesforce**, **Oracle**, and **IoT**. I leverage my expertise in **Customer Relationship Management** and **Market Analysis** to develop tailored strategies that drive revenue and enhance customer satisfaction. My strong **Technical Expertise** ensures that I can articulate complex technical concepts effectively, facilitating successful negotiations with stakeholders.
In addition to my sales engineering capabilities, I possess a robust foundation in full-stack development, having used **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to build high-performance solutions in healthcare and financial sectors. My background encompasses a wide tech stack, including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, complemented by deep cloud expertise in **Azure** and **AWS**. I am well-versed in developing enterprise-grade platforms and integrating AI/ML capabilities for enhanced analytics and automation, ensuring alignment with industry compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My experience in **microservices architecture** and **CI/CD automation** further aids in delivering robust and secure applications.
